timeline.bodyText: this pr should wait #14315, and use this method in ExecPlanDumper right?
timeline.author: wenlong88
timeline.diffHunk:

  */

+	/**
+	 * Returns a string which describes this node.

replies.bodyText: no, if this pr is merged before #14315, I will update ExecPlanDumper based on getDesc
replies.author: godfreyhe
